nodes.bodyText: Will switching to TimestampType.withoutZone() in IcebergSourceFlatDataBenchmark help?

Not really.. The Iceberg <-> Spark integration does not support TimestampType.withoutZone()
https://github.com/apache/incubator-iceberg/blob/45a44f4cf49300db9a89e205d172146591b0bad1/spark/src/main/java/org/apache/iceberg/spark/TypeToSparkType.java#L111
